akas: Me and My Twin World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
akas from release info: Me and My Twin World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
imdb.plot outline: Cecilie and Katrine are identical twins, but after Cecilie got cancer they look a lot less alike. After the summer holidays they will attend a new school, and for the first time in their lives they will be in different class rooms. This is their decision, since they want to get new friends that they do not have to share. The twins are very excited about how things will work out at their new school, and the first big dilemma is what to wear on the first day - and in particular whether Cecilie should wear a cap or her wig.
